title: M9: Fixing an MT output when translating into English
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: intermediate. * SUPERVISION: self-assessment. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 3 minutes. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: English and French. * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: in order to adapt this activity to other languages, instructors may use any sentence pairs with machine translation mistakes. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS:
